page.title: 09THE DAY OF A VILLAGE BOY(2)
page.content: THEN WE GO DOWN TO DINNER AND ITS LIVER AND BACON AND GREENS. THEN FOR PUDDING IT IS BUBBLE GUM PIE AFTER WE HAVE FINISHED HAVING OUR DINNER WE GO OUT TO PLAY FOR ABOUT 45 MINS AND WHEN WE COME BACK IN WE DO SOME DOMESDAY PROJECT THE 2.20 PLAY IS LAST PLAYOF THAT DAY WHICH IS ABOUT 20 MINS LONG AT ABOUT 2.45 WE COME BACK IN AND DO MORE WORK UNTIL 3.30 WE GET OUR HOMEWORK AND GO. I GO HOME WITH SIMON AND CLIVE IN CLIVES CAR WHEN I GET HOME I DO MY HOMEWORK AND GET READY TO GO BELL RINGING 1RING THE SECOND BELL. WHEN I GET BACK FROM BELL RINGING I HAVE A BATH AND GO IN THE NEXT ROOM AND GO TO BED AND READ ALL MY BOOKS AND I HAVE JUST STARTED A JOKE BOOK BY TONY BLACKBURN.THEN I THINK ABOUT THE DAY AHEAD.
